name: uCount Visualizer
body:
### Next generation uCount:
*uCount Visualizer* renews *uCount* with a breath of freshness: with this release, data examination was made more easy and charts section was improved with additional plots. Moreover moving the project in [R](https://www.r-project.org) under [shiny apps](https://www.shinyapps.io) framework, gave it a readiness for further improvements.

uCount Visualizer is available [here](https://abenedetti.shinyapps.io/uCountVisualizer/).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
